channel.title: Compile Check Please,

item.title: Compile Check Please,
item.dc:creator: @Edp32281 Edp32281
item.description:
@Edp32281 wrote:

Here is one that should work…

@@echo off
COLOR E
title Elijah’s Compiler
echo Hope You Enjoy My Server!!!
echo -------------------------
echo Files Being Compiled…
echo -------------------------
echo Made By Elijah…
echo Compile in progress
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
COLOR E
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Compile Completed
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pause
exit

Try that and if it don’t work i have a lot you can try?

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Check Please,
item.dc:creator: @rhysloveshaz rhysloveshaz
item.description:
@rhysloveshaz wrote:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Thats The Compile Code Is That Right?
Please Help

Read full topic
